dmca.title: [ABUSE] [eBay:NF06U408] Inappropriate and fraudulent use of copyrighted materials
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 11:21 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] [eBay:NF06U408] Inappropriate and fraudulent use of
copyrighted materials

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Friday, February 24,
2006 at
1:40:43 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] [eBay:NF06U408] Inappropriate and fraudulent use of copyrighted
materials

MESSAGE BODY:
Dear ThePlanet.com, 



We have just learned that your service is being used to violate eBay 

Inc.'s trademarks and/or copyrights.  Specifically, it appears that 

a ThePlanet.com user is hosting a page at http://johmdu.mybesthost.com/
which uses our 

trademarks inappropriately. 



While we believe that the above information gives your company more 

than a sufficient basis for disabling the page immediately, out of 

caution we note that your user?s unauthorized reproduction of eBay?s 

trademark and copyrighted materials violates federal law, and places 

an independent legal obligation on your company to remove the 

offending page(s) immediately upon receiving notice from eBay, the 

owner of the copyrighted materials. Accordingly, the information 

below serves as eBay?s notice of infringement pursuant to the Digital 

Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. Section 512 (c)(3)(A): 



I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the 

agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain 

intellectual property rights, said owner being named eBay Inc. I have 

a good faith belief that the website located at URL
http://johmdu.mybesthost.com/ has 

its copyright in each page of its website and associated source code. 

Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material 

or items claimed to be infringing. 



We sincerely appreciate your immediate attention to this important 

matter. We would also appreciate if you would take steps to confirm 

the accuracy of any contact information that your user may have 

provided to you in establishing the account. Should you have any 

accurate information that could assist eBay and law enforcement in 

tracking this individual, we greatly appreciate your assistance, as 

we know that you do not condone the use of your services for such 

criminal purposes. 



Finally, please be advised that we have referred this issue to the 

Federal Bureau of Investigation for their investigation.  The F.B.I. 

has requested that we convey to you in this message their request 

that you preserve for 90 days all records relating to this web site, 

including all associated accounts, computer logs, files, IP 

addresses, telephone numbers, subscriber and user records, 

communications, and all programs and files on storage media in regard 

to all Internet connection information, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. ? 

2703(f). While we do not act as an agent of the FBI in conveying this 

request, we do intend to fully cooperate with their investigation, 

and encourage you to do so as well. 




RFC822 HEADERS:
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1FCY6g-0005FO-1a; Fri, 24 Feb 2006 02:15:18 -0600
Received: from mx02 ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Ignatius@ebay.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim)
        id 1FCY6A-0004za-Sj; Fri, 24 Feb 2006 02:14:46 -0600
Received: from thistle.sjc.ebay.com ([66.135.207.155]
        helo=fts-05.netsec.ebay.com)
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Ignatius@ebay.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1FCY64-000HHt-C7; Fri, 24 Feb 2006 02:14:46 -0600
Received: by fts-05.netsec.ebay.com (Postfix, from userid 48)
        id 923ED9C735; Thu, 23 Feb 2006 23:40:43 -0800 (PST)
To: abuse@theplanet.com, gwhite@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com
